msbt.message: So I guess Deinonychus might've had fab feathers on their arms?! That's sooo dino chic!
Megaloceros antlers are like huge wings bolted to their heads!
Imagine riding a Pteranodon across the sky! I'd stand on it like a stage and sing among the clouds!
T. Rex was "King of Dinosaurs," huh? Wellcall me "T. , Queen of Dinosaurs"!
I love the plates on the backs of the Stegosaurus! You could paint flowers on them for extra style!
If I had a Brachiosaurus? I'd stand on its head and yell, "Check out my pet dino! Its name is Brachi!"
I always thought Mammoths were just elephants. But they're WAAAAY bigger. And fuzzier! And cuddlier!
Anomalocaris have the biggest, cutest, most adorable eyes!<10_4 /> Their mouths are less cute, though.
Even though they just look like fish, eusthenopteron are, like, the PEAK of evolution. They're evolutionistas!
The head and body of dunkleosteus have different styles. Two patterns in one outfit is a riiisky moooove!
The Quetzalcoatlus has a great name. ? Quetzalcoatlus? I might just change my name!
Coprolite is fossilized poop Will future folks study my Oh, grody. Blech! Groblechy!
The juramaia is sooo teeny-tiny! I can't believe something so cute lived alongside scary dinos!
Wait, YOU brought this fossil, ?Ohmigosh, that's SO cool!
So this is how evolution makes way for an adorable like me,
